RelatedSentence: Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev started his official visit to Vietnam on May 18 .
The Azerbaijani president and his spouse Mehriban Aliyeva were met by senior state and government officials of Vietnam .
Azerbaijan opened its embassy in Vietnam last December , while the Azerbaijan - Vietnam inter-parliamentary friendship group was established in Hanoi in November 2013 .
In October 2013 , Vietnam simplified the visa regime for Azerbaijani citizens , making it possible for Azerbaijani citizens to obtain a visa upon arrival at Vietnam 's airports .
